td.a: COMCAST ANNOUNCES COMPREHENSIVE COVID-19 RESPONSE TO HELP KEEP AMERICANS CONNECTED TO THE INTERNET
td.br:
In mid-March, Comcast began offering 60-day complimentary internet service for low income residents that do not have broadband in the home. Due to extended shelter-in-place directives, we are extending enrollment for an additional two weeks.
Qualifying households that enroll in Internet Essentials will not be subject to a term contract or credit check and there will be no shipping fee for the modem. After the first two free months expire, they can either cancel the service (which they also can do at any time) or keep it as a regular paying Internet Essentials customer at $9.95 per month.

td.a: Announcement: Remote learning and grading for all students K-12
td.br: Throughout the first three weeks of our district remote learning process, North Plainfield teachers, staff, and administrators have worked diligently to plan and prepare lessons for students through Google Classroom. As we approach the district scheduled spring break, this letter serves to make you aware that upon returning from spring break, the district will begin an updated approach to remote learning.

div.h1: North Plainfield Boro School District Alerts

p.span: In an effort to prevent the further spread of Covid-19 in the State, Governor Murphy has announced that all public and private schools must remain closed through at least May 15, 2020. The Governor will reevaluate the public health situation as it relates to schools at that time.

p.span: En un esfuerzo por evitar una mayor propagación de Covid-19 en el estado, el gobernador Murphy ha anunciado que todas las escuelas públicas y privadas deben permanecer cerradas al menos hasta el 15 de mayo de 2020. El gobernador reevaluará la situación de salud pública en lo que respecta a las escuelas En ese tiempo.

p.span: Maschio’s has expanded their commitment to provide eligible students with food by opening two additional locations at East End School and West End School. Effective Tuesday, April 21, 2020, Maschio’s will distribute lunch and the next day’s breakfast between 11:00 am and 1:00 pm at the Middle School gym foyer, East End School (side driveway cafeteria door) and West End School (rear cafeteria door). Social distancing guidelines must be followed for any lines and we will mark the grounds to indicate safe distancing.

p.span: En asociación con Maschio's, hemos ampliado las oportunidades de alimentación al abrir dos ubicaciones adicionales en East End School y West End School. A partir del martes 21 de abril de 2020, Maschio's distribuirá el almuerzo y el desayuno del día siguiente entre las 11:00 a.m. y la 1:00 p.m. en la escuela intermedia (vestíbulo del gimnasio), la escuela East End (puerta de la cafetería de la entrada lateral) y la escuela West End ( puerta trasera de la cafetería). Se deben seguir las pautas de distanciamiento social para cualquier línea, y marcaremos los motivos para indicar un distanciamiento seguro.
